statements: SELECT * FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment WHERE company_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT company_name, financial_performance_rating FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment WHERE board_diversity_rating > 3;
SELECT company_name, governance_rating, financial_performance_rating FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment ORDER BY governance_rating DESC;
SELECT AVG(governance_rating), AVG(financial_performance_rating) FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment WHERE board_diversity_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment WHERE governance_rating > 3 ORDER BY company_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_name, financial_performance_rating FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment WHERE board_diversity_rating < 2;

SELECT company_name, SUM(governance_rating) AS total_governance_rating FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_governance_rating > 10 ORDER BY total_governance_rating DESC;
SELECT AVG(governance_rating) AS avg_governance_rating, AVG(financial_performance_rating) AS avg_financial_performance_rating FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment;
SELECT DISTINCT company_name, board_diversity_rating FROM corporate_governance_risk_assessment WHERE governance_rating = 5 ORDER BY board_diversity_rating ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_id, governance_practices FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE outcome='high' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT company_id, score FROM GovernanceScores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY company_id ASC;
SELECT company_id, count(*) AS assessments_count FROM RiskAssessmentData GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE company_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT company_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM GovernanceScores GROUP BY company_id HAVING MAX(score) > 80;
SELECT company_id, governance_practices, outcome FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE governance_practices LIKE '%governance%' AND outcome='positive';
SELECT company_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM GovernanceScores GROUP BY company_id HAVING SUM(score) > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT date FROM RiskAssessmentData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT governance_practice, risk_score FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY governance_practice DESC;
SELECT company_id, year, data_type, data_value FROM historical_data WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM outcomes WHERE outcome_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY year ASC, outcome_value DESC;
SELECT company_id, AVG(risk_score) AS average_score FROM risk_assessment GROUP BY company_id HAVING AVG(risk_score) > 2.5;
SELECT company_id, governance_practice, risk_score FROM risk_assessment
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE year = 2020 ORDER BY data_value DESC
SELECT company_id, COUNT(outcome_id) AS num_outcomes FROM outcomes GROUP BY company_id HAVING COUNT(outcome_id) > 2
SELECT DISTINCT company_id, governance_practice FROM risk_assessment INNER JOIN outcomes ON risk_assessment.company_id = outcomes.company_id
SELECT company_id, MAX(risk_score) AS max_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score > 0
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data
SELECT id, governance_practice, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data
SELECT practice_name, description FROM governance_practices
SELECT id, outcome_type, relevance FROM outcomes
SELECT year, data, source FROM historical_data
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment_data ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT id, governance_practice, outcome FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE risk_score > 75;
SELECT outcome, governance_practice, risk_score FROM risk_assessment_data WHERE governance_practice LIKE 'Risk%' ORDER BY governance_practice ASC;

SELECT rd.id, rd.governance_practice, gp.practice_name, o.outcome_type FROM risk_assessment_data rd INNER JOIN governance_practices gp ON rd.id = gp.id INNER JOIN outcomes o ON rd.id = o.id WHERE o.relevance > 7;
SELECT h.year, h.data, r.outcome, r.governance_practice FROM historical_data h JOIN risk_assessment_data r ON h.id = r.id WHERE h.source = 'Internal Reports';
SELECT * FROM RiskAssessment ORDER BY assess_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, risk_score FROM RiskAssessment WHERE company_name = 'Example Company';
SELECT * FROM GovernancePractices WHERE practice_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY practice_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, outcome_type FROM OutcomeAnalysis WHERE outcome_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY outcome_date DESC;
SELECT id, data_value FROM HistoricalData WHERE data_type = 'Revenue' AND company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM CompanyInfo WHERE industry_sector='Technology';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_location FROM CompanyInfo WHERE industry_sector='Finance';
SELECT hd.data_value, ci.company_name FROM HistoricalData hd JOIN CompanyInfo ci ON hd.company_id = ci.id;
SELECT ra.company_name, ra.risk_score, gp.practice_description FROM RiskAssessment ra JOIN GovernancePractices gp ON ra.id = gp.company_id;
SELECT oa.outcome_type, oa.outcome_date, ci.company_name FROM OutcomeAnalysis oa JOIN CompanyInfo ci ON oa.company_id = ci.id;
